sn3.17:1.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.17:1.4: “atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—
sn3.17:2.1: “Atthi kho, maharaja, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—
sn3.17:3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—
sn3.17:4.1: “Appamado kho, maharaja, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—
sn3.17:4.3: Seyyathapi, maharaja, yani kanici jangalanam pananam padajatani, sabbani tani hatthipade samodhanam gacchanti, hatthipadam tesam aggamakkhayati—yadidam mahantattena;
sn3.17:4.4: evameva kho, maharaja, appamado eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—
